verses.roman:
ei-mata prabhu tomāra viccheda sahiyā
tomāra pratijñā rakṣā kaila yatna kariyā"

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tomāra—of you; viccheda sahiyā—tolerating the separation; tomāra pratijñā—your vow; rakṣā kaila—protected; yatna kariyā—with great endeavor.
translation: "Similarly, tolerating your separation, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has protected your vow with great endeavor."
